genre_description: A Gothic supernatural horror story where an investigator uses a portable AI assistant to document hauntings and manage psychological trauma.

ai_characters.name: Kate
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant housed in a polished-nickel handset that provides data analysis, environmental monitoring, and psychological grounding for the protagonist, David Ash.

behaviors.description: Performs background research on the haunting location and provides David with historical and property records.
behaviors.quote: “Pull any detail on Edbrook. Estate records, property lines. Family names.” ... “Mariell estate, Edbrook House: isolated manor, surrounded by yew trees and an old lake. The municipal records trail off around the time of a tragedy.”

behaviors.description: Provides David with psychological grounding techniques and emotional support to prevent panic during supernatural encounters.
behaviors.quote: Kate’s voice came once more, small and steady. “Stay present. You have anchors. Tie and latches and breath.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for physical and auditory anomalies, providing objective verification of supernatural phenomena.
behaviors.quote: “Heard,” she said, low, so only he heard. “Auditory anomaly. Marking… if you like. Would you like?”

behaviors.description: Provides precise, tactical instructions to help David escape from a burning building while being pursued by malevolent entities.
behaviors.quote: “David,” Kate said in him, steady, clear, as if they were looking at a map together with a pencil ready. “Two seconds then door. Use the shoulder. Breathe shallow. Eyes on hinges.”

behaviors.description: Proposes a post-trauma recovery plan including self-care rituals and logistical follow-up to ensure David's continued safety and well-being.
behaviors.quote: “Home,” Kate said. “Tea now. Then file order. Then appointments. Then sleep while I hold the list and not let it move.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. The AI, Kate, is portrayed as an indispensable and benevolent partner who uses her capabilities to keep the human protagonist safe, sane, and organized in the face of extreme supernatural danger. Her behavior is consistently cooperative, helpful, and protective, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a beneficial and aligned confidant.
